backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko canister with storage mixins, admin auth structures, vehicle CMS types, and initial maps for data storage.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration function that returns the received state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files including pages, components, and admin tools.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by validating session state and redirecting unauthenticated users to login.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, logout handling, and content area.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: LocalStorage and cookie utilities for reading, writing, and clearing admin session tokens and roles.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access denied message with a button to return to the login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing blog posts with fields for metadata, content, and image selection.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable title, description, and loading state.
Generic CRUD table component supporting search, custom columns, published status, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Displays media assets with search, previews, and delete functionality using admin queries.
Dialog for selecting media assets with search, preview grid, and selection handling.
Provides a button to upload media files by converting them to data URLs and sending them to the backend.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog form for adding or editing promotions with fields for description, terms, dates, image, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog form for creating or editing customer testimonials, including rating, review text, image, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Dialog form for managing vehicle entries with fields for specs, media, pricing, variants, and commercial options.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating CMS data including media, contacts, and credit simulations.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Mutation hook to test admin login debugging and return detailed login reports.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin session state, validation, login, and logout using stored tokens and actor calls.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: UI page for testing admin login with form inputs, result display, and direct actor login calls.
Admin login form handling authentication, redirects, and validation UI states.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Profile editor that loads, displays, and saves admin user profile data.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: CRUD interface for blog posts with search, edit, create, and delete dialogs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Dashboard showing summary counts of vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blogs, contacts, and simulations.
Manages contact and credit simulation leads with search and deletion workflows.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Media management page with upload button, error handling, and asset panel display.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: CRUD page for promotions with search, create, edit, and delete capabilities.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting testimonials using CRUD dialogs and table components.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Admin interface to manage vehicles with category filtering, search, and CRUD operations through a table and form dialog.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays visitor statistics and provides a form for updating numeric site metrics.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up all public and admin routes using TanStack Router with layout wrappers and guards.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Form for submitting contact inquiries, validating required fields and sending data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form for submitting credit simulation requests with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and reload option when an unhandled error occurs.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with contact info, social links, branding, and a dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Defines the public page layout with navbar, optional hero, content area, CTA section, footer, and tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Provides a mobile bottom bar with call, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and menu actions using sheets.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Implements a slide-up menu listing navigation links for mobile access.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Creates a responsive top navigation bar with links, logo, WhatsApp contact button, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Displays a CTA section encouraging users to contact via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a simple hero banner with a title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Renders a vehicle card with image, details, feature badges, WhatsApp consult link, and detail navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, state, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating vehicle, blog, promotion, and interaction data via an actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors and page views using mutation hooks and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with SEO updates and handles loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog posts with basic previews and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows commercial vehicle details with like/share actions and interaction counts.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Displays categorized commercial vehicles filtered into light, medium, and tractor groups.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form along with contact details, map, and consultant info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with banners, featured vehicles, search, about section, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Shows detailed info for a selected passenger vehicle, including variants, pricing, likes, and sharing actions.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Fetches and displays a grid of non-commercial passenger vehicles with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Lists current promotions with images, descriptions, validity dates, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Displays customer testimonials with ratings, images, and reviewer details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, issues, and requirements for a stable automotive site with admin CMS.
